item.title: 瑞银集团首席执行官埃尔莫蒂警告瑞士银行业改革过度
item.description: 瑞银集团首席执行官塞尔吉奥·埃尔莫蒂表示，瑞士拟议的新银行监管条例"走得太远"，该银行需要具有竞争力的监管框架才能实现增长。【原文：UBS Group AG Chief Executive Officer Sergio Ermotti said the proposed new banking regulations in Switzerland go “too far” and that lender needs a competitive regulatory framework to grow.】

item.title: 交易员猜测印度期权市场是否将面临更多限制措施
item.description: 印度对衍生品的严厉管控成功遏制了期权市场的狂热，这场狂热曾让数百万小投资者蒙受损失。但交易员们至今仍不确定是否会有新的限制措施出台，进一步改变市场格局。【原文：India’s derivatives clampdown was successful in reining in an options exuberance that burned millions of small investors, but traders have been left in the dark on whether new curbs are coming to further alter the market.】

item.title: SK海力士计划投资130亿美元新建芯片封装工厂
item.description: SK海力士计划斥资19万亿韩元（约合129亿美元）新建一座先进芯片封装工厂，为迎接人工智能需求展开大规模扩张。【原文：SK Hynix Inc. plans to spend 19 trillion won ($12.9 billion) building a new advanced chip packaging facility, initiating a big expansion in anticipation of AI demand.】

item.title: 日本国债暴跌，政治风险重燃令投资者惊慌
item.description: 日本政府债券周二下跌，因政治风险上升重新点燃了投资者对财政政策的担忧。【原文：Japanese government bonds dropped on Tuesday as rising political risks reignited investor concerns over fiscal policy.】

item.title: 中国调查境外ETF交易 此前Jane Street印度业务遭查
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国正密切关注简街资本等外国公司如何参与其规模达8590亿美元的交易所交易基金市场，并要求券商提供相关业务活动的信息。【原文：China is scrutinizing how Jane Street Group and other foreign firms participate in its $859 billion exchange-traded fund market, seeking information on such activities carried out by brokers, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普称科技巨头必须承担数据中心电力成本
item.description: 针对美国选民对电价上涨的担忧，唐纳德·特朗普总统表示，其政府正与微软公司进行磋商，以确保消费者不必为巨型数据中心承担高昂费用。【原文：President Donald Trump, addressing American voter concerns about rising electricity prices, said his administration had been in talks with Microsoft to ensure that consumers “don’t pick up the tab” for enormous data centers.】

item.title: 日本高市裕子拉拢韩国，中韩裂痕加深
item.description: 日本首相高市早苗将于周二在首脑会议上寻求与韩国加强联系，此举旨在遏制日本与中国的外交和贸易争端不断加剧，同时应对北京方面试图在关键美国盟友之间制造分歧的努力。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi will seek closer ties with South Korea at a summit Tuesday, as Tokyo moves to contain a deepening diplomatic and trade dispute with China and counter Beijing’s efforts to drive a wedge between key US allies.】

item.title: 日本的片山与贝森特共同对日元贬值表示担忧
item.description: 日本财务大臣片山皐月与美国财政部长斯科特·贝森特在华盛顿举行双边会晤时，共同对日元持续走弱表示担忧。当前日元汇率正逼近关键门槛，此前当局曾在此关口出手干预。【原文：Japan’s Finance Minister Satsuki Katayama and US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent shared concerns about the weakening yen during a bilateral meeting in Washington as the currency edged toward a key threshold where authorities have intervened in the past.】

item.title: 贝莱德裁减数百个岗位，削减约1%员工
item.description: 贝莱德公司正裁减数百个职位，成为近期华尔街最新一家缩减员工规模的金融机构。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is cutting hundreds of jobs across the company, becoming the latest Wall Street firm to rein in headcount in recent weeks.】

item.title: 金价在因担忧美联储独立性而飙升后趋稳
item.description: 因特朗普政府威胁对美联储提起刑事指控，市场担忧美联储独立性，黄金价格周一大幅上涨后趋于平稳。【原文：Gold steadied after surging on Monday on worries over the Federal Reserve’s independence as the Trump administration threatened the central bank with a criminal indictment.】

item.title: 2026年澳大利亚消费者信心持续低迷，利率上调担忧加剧
item.description: 澳大利亚消费者以低迷情绪迎来新年，随着央行预计将在未来数月加息，民众对家庭财务状况的担忧日益加剧。【原文：Australian consumers entered the new year in a gloomy mood in January, signaling rising concern about household finances as the central bank is expected to lift interest rates in coming months.】

item.title: 莱纳斯稀土公司宣布首席执行官阿曼达·拉卡兹将于六月卸任
item.description: 莱纳斯稀土有限公司首席执行官阿曼达·拉卡兹将在执掌这家澳大利亚基准股指过去一年表现最突出的企业十二年后卸任。【原文：Lynas Rare Earths Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Amanda Lacaze will step down after 12 years at the helm of one of the top performers on Australia’s benchmark stock index over the past year.】

item.title: 油价触及一个月高点，特朗普誓言对伊朗石油买家加征关税
item.description: 油价升至12月初以来最高水平，此前美国总统唐纳德·特朗普表示将对与伊朗"有业务往来"的国家商品征收25%的关税。【原文：Oil rose to the highest level since early December after US President Donald Trump said he is imposing a 25% tariff on goods from countries “doing business” with Iran.】

item.title: 日股受惠于日元走软及选举预期利好而攀升
item.description: 日本股市在连续三天假期后高开，因市场对国内提前大选的预期升温，重新点燃了所谓的"高市交易"，而日元走软则提振了出口类股。【原文：Japanese shares opened higher after a three-day weekend as rising expectations for a domestic snap election reignited the so-called Takaichi trade and a weaker yen boosted exporters.】

item.title: 阿根廷动用多边资金偿还25亿美元对美债务互换
item.description: 阿根廷央行官员表示，该国已从某未具名多边机构获得融资，用于偿还货币互换协议项下欠美国财政部的25亿美元债务。【原文：Argentina secured financing from an unnamed multilateral institution to repay $2.5 billion to the US Treasury from a currency swap agreement, according to an official from the nation’s central bank.】

item.title: 吉佳电子完成6亿美元融资后即将登陆香港市场
item.description: 香港两天内迎来第二家半导体公司上市，凸显投资者对人工智能相关中国股票兴趣日益浓厚。【原文：Hong Kong’s second semiconductor-company listing in as many days underscores growing investor interest in Chinese stocks related to artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯认为当前利率将稳定就业与通胀
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰·威廉姆斯表示，当前利率水平"处于良好位置"，既能稳定劳动力市场，又能使通胀率回归央行设定的2%目标。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said interest rates are “well positioned” to stabilize the labor market and bring inflation back to the central bank’s 2% goal.】

item.title: 中国借助大数据和公开曝光追查逃税者
item.description: 中国正加大力度对公民海外巨额未申报资产征税，当局试图以此填补不断扩大的财政赤字。【原文：China is intensifying efforts to tax its citizens’ mountain of undisclosed overseas assets as authorities attempt to plug a widening budget deficit.】

item.title: 亚洲股市料将无视特朗普对美联储的威胁：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市有望跟随美国股市上涨，推动股价再创新高。尽管特朗普政府对美联储的攻击不断升级，但市场情绪依然高涨。【原文：Asian stocks were primed to track US gains that pushed shares to fresh highs, as sentiment remained buoyant despite the Trump administration’s escalating attacks on the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 菲律宾比索为何如此疲软？谁从中获益？
item.description: 一月初，菲律宾比索兑美元汇率跌至59.38比索兑1美元的历史最低点。尽管此后汇率有所回升，但官方已暗示容忍进一步贬值，交易员正密切关注央行干预的任何迹象。【原文：In early January, the Philippine peso slid to 59.38 per dollar — its weakest level on record. While it has since recouped some losses, officials have signaled a tolerance for further depreciation and traders are watching closely for any signs of central bank intervention.】

item.title: 看涨原油期权交易量飙升至历史新高，交易员担忧伊朗风险
item.description: 石油交易商正以史无前例的速度纷纷采取防范措施，以应对油价飙升的风险。他们担忧伊朗抗议活动将升级，进而导致供应中断。【原文：Oil traders are lining up protection against a spike in prices at a rate never seen before on concern that protests in Iran will escalate and result in a disruption to supply.】

item.title: 保守党与法拉奇在英国预算监督机构问题上划清界限
item.description: 英国保守党正试图在预算责任办公室的未来问题上，与其崛起的右翼竞争对手改革党（Reform UK）形成鲜明对比。【原文：Britain’s Conservative Party is seeking to draw a clear contrast with its insurgent right-wing rival, Reform UK, over the future of the Office for Budget Responsibility.】

item.title: 特朗普誓言对伊朗“商业伙伴”商品征收25%关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普表示，将对与伊朗"有业务往来"的国家商品征收25%的关税，以此加大对德黑兰政府的压力。该国政府正因大规模抗议活动而动荡不安。【原文：President Donald Trump said he is imposing a 25% tariff on goods from countries “doing business” with Iran, ratcheting up pressure on the government in Tehran that has been rocked by widespread protests.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁后，华尔街购房者计划提出反要约
item.description: 华尔街购房者因特朗普总统的猛烈抨击而感到不安，正策划自己的方案以化解被住房市场拒之门外的风险。【原文：Wall Street homebuyers rattled by President Donald Trump’s broadside are plotting their own proposals to defuse the risk of getting shut out of the housing market.】

item.title: 加拿大逮捕2023年金条劫案嫌疑人，逮捕地点距案发现场不远
item.description: 一名涉嫌参与加拿大史上最大黄金劫案的嫌疑人，于周一在距犯罪现场不远处被捕。【原文：A suspect in what investigators call Canada’s largest-ever gold heist was arrested on Monday not far from the scene of the crime.】

item.title: 新西兰商业信心指数因降息逼近12年高点
item.description: 新西兰商业信心飙升至近12年最高水平，央行激进降息举措正推动经济复苏。【原文：New Zealand business confidence surged to the highest in almost 12 years as aggressive central bank rate cuts spark an economic recovery.】

item.title: 小盘股创下自2019年以来对标标普500指数的最长期连涨纪录
item.description: 小盘股刚刚创下七年来对大盘股的最长期连涨纪录。【原文：Small-capitalization stocks just notched their longest winning streak over their larger peers in seven years.】

item.title: 特朗普政府为何就大楼翻修事宜传唤美联储
item.description:
美国司法部向美联储发出大陪审团传票。今日《重大事件》节目将探讨：调查背后有何玄机？这对美联储意味着什么？

【原文：

The Fed was served grand jury subpoenas by the DOJ. Today on the Big Take: What’s behind the investigation and what it means for the Fed.

item.title: Meta计划裁减旗下Reality Labs部门10%的岗位
item.description: Meta Platforms公司计划裁减旗下Reality Labs部门10%的岗位，此举是其更广泛战略的一部分——将资金从某些虚拟现实产品转向其他人工智能可穿戴设备。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. plans to cut 10% of jobs in the company’s Reality Labs division, part of a broader strategy to shift money away from some virtual reality products and into other AI wearables.】

item.title: 霍楚计划大幅扩建纽约核电产能
item.description: 纽约州州长凯西·霍楚正大幅扩大其推动新建核电产能的举措，以满足激增的电力需求。【原文：New York Governor Kathy Hochul is significantly expanding her push for new nuclear capacity to meet surging demand for electricity.】
